data.title: Isle O'Dreams Lodge ﻿
data.meta_description: Our unique resort is located on a peninsula with beautiful views of Bad Axe Lake from every cabin. Most decks are just feet from the shoreline. We offer supervised children's activities as well as a heated outdoor pool. Let us help you make family memories that last a lifetime! Located on a secluded peninsula, amongst the Norway Pines you will find the peace & tranquility of Bad Axe Lake. All of our cabins are situated along 2000 feet of beautiful shoreline.
data.text:
About

Our unique resort is located on a peninsula with beautiful views of Bad Axe Lake from every cabin. Most decks are just feet from the shoreline. We offer supervised children's activities as well as a heated outdoor pool. Let us help you make family memories that last a lifetime! Located on a secluded peninsula, amongst the Norway Pines you will find the peace & tranquility of Bad Axe Lake. All of our cabins are situated along 2000 feet of beautiful shoreline. Bad Axe Lake is a hidden treasure with no public access and covers 300 acres, producing excellent Northern Pike, Muskie, Large/Smallmouth Bass, Crappie, and Bluegill.Enjoy clean, newly carpeted, modern cabins with multifaceted lake views from almost every window of your cabin. Each housekeeping cabin features a full bath, kitchen, living/dining room, and Lakeside Deck; as well as many new beds and furniture to make your vacation more comfortable.We are thrilled with the addition of A NEW SWIMMING POOL with SUN LOVER PATIO which opened in 2000. Our sandy swimming beach is located next to playground and lodge area. The 1930’s log lodge is a beautiful historic landmark of Isle O’Dreams. Inside, play ping-pong, pool, video games, or enjoy an ice cream cone on a hot summers day. We offer planned activities to be enjoyed during the peak summer weeks. Monday evening potluck feast is always a hit and a chance to meet all your cabin neighbors. Bonfire with s’mores, bingo night, free water-skiing, and kids hike are some events offered to enhance your summer vacation. Enjoy our putting green, play shuffleboard or volleyball or just relax in our sauna.Your vacation is very important to us, and our goal is to make this a memorable time for your family. Come enjoy the Northwoods.Your Hosts: Russell & Stacy invite you!Web Address: www.isleodreams.com E-Mail: [email protected]
